recipesJson.name: Marina Classics Kronut: Cloning with the Crew
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
This an attempt at Marina classics kronut. Enjoy!!
Flavor notes here====> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cn7PVdl-87I&t=11s

Come join us on our Facebook. New mixers always welcome====> https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmcdiy/

They describe this as an irresistible kronut flavor that satiates with rich, buttery pastry, sugary glaze, sweet vanilla and a touch of creamy milk. Your taste buds will scream with pleasure as you enjoy this luxurious dessert flavor that has just the right amount of sweetness.

pageContext.name: Marina Classics Kronut: Cloning with the Crew
